document.full_text: he u.n. human rights council established a special investigator on iran on thursday, a move spearheaded by washington that will subject tehran's record to u.n. scrutiny for the first time in nearly a decade.
document.title: u.n. human rights body approves investigator on iran
lines_and_colors: he u.n. human rights council established a special investigator on iran on thursday, a move spearheaded by washington that will subject tehran's record to u.n. scrutiny for the first time in nearly a decade.
